headline: Get a Head Start on the Fooday Revolution
headline_desc: As a qualified individual, you have the opportunity to be one of the first to invest in the future of restaurant review platform! By purchasing Food Coins during the pre-sale, you'll not only be supporting the development of the Fooday platform, but you'll also have the privilege of being one of the first to earn rewards for your contributions as a Foodie.

clam_holder_phase.title: CLAM Holder Presale
clam_holder_phase.desc: OtterClam members with $CLAM can purchase pFOOD with 10% OFF during phase 1. This is a limited-time offer, so be fast!

public_phase.title: Public Presale
public_phase.desc: By purchasing Food Coins now, you'll receive a promising price and be one of the first to join the Fooday community.

dialog.term: Hereby I acknowledge that one wallet can only deposit once during CLAM holder pre-sale and agree to the token purchase agreement and token sale term.

success.title: Fooday-licious!
success.desc: You've just taken a big bite out of the future of restaurant reviews by purchasing Food Coins!
success.hint: To stay on top of the latest Fooday news and updates, be sure to give us a follow. Let's make some tasty things happen together!

about.title: About
about.content: providing Fooides with an incentive to share their experiences and helping to create a trustworthy and accurate source of information for food lovers everywhere.

connect_desc: Please connect your wallet to continue the purchase:

faq.title: FAQ
faq.a1: Fooday is a new restaurant review platform that puts Foodies first and provides a more trustworthy and accurate source of information. The platform is designed to incentivize Foodies to leave accurate and detailed reviews, while also promoting positive behavior within the community.
faq.a2: Food Coin is the token of the Fooday platform, a new restaurant review platform that puts Foodies first and provides a more trustworthy and accurate source of information. Food Coins can be used within the platform, traded on cryptocurrency exchanges, and more.
faq.q3: What is the Food Coin pre-sale?
faq.a3: The Food Coin pre-sale is an opportunity for qualified individuals to purchase Food Coins, the token of the Fooday platform, at a discounted price. This is a limited-time offer and provides the opportunity to invest in the future of restaurant reviews and be one of the first to earn rewards as a Foodie on the Fooday platform.
faq.q4: Is there a limit on the number of Food Coins I can purchase during the pre-sale?
faq.a4: Yes, there is a limit on the number of Food Coins that can be purchased during the pre-sale. Please check the pre-sale page for more information on the availability of Food Coins.
faq.q5: What is the vesting term for pre-sale Food Coins?
faq.a5: Participants of the pre-sale will have their $pFOOD tokens vested over a period of one year, with an initial release equivalent to roughly 50% of the total amount after 180 days, followed by a drip release of the remaining tokens over the next 185 days.
